title: Energetica Exhibition on Loan
shortText: The Energetica exhibition is coming to the Community Science Museum.
fullText: On loan from the NEMO Science Museum in Amsterdam, the Energetica exhibition is coming to the Community Science Museum. Experience the power of the elements!

title: Visiting Professor of Aeronautics
shortText: Prof Sheila Widnall to deliver lectures on aeronautics.
fullText: Prof Sheila Widnall from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology to deliver lectures on aeronautics.

title: Night in the Museum
shortText: Sleep over beside dinosaurs and science displays.
fullText: Get your family together for an exciting night in the museum as you sleep over beside dinosaurs and science displays. Explore the wonders of science together.
